content:
Listing Collection Members

  • Use the DAV PROPFIND method

  • Listing will include both internal and referential members

  • If Depth = infinity, the server SHOULD NOT (MUST NOT?) follow references into any collections to which they may refer

Previous slide Next slide Back to first slide View graphic version

Notes:

    LA discussion led to recommendation not to follow references into target collections:
    Would have to check for cycles
    Risk very deep hierarchies
    Jim thinks the LA discussion supported the stronger statement that servers MUST NOT follow references into target collections.
